meta.description: ORTAM AI – incubator, academy, and placement hub accelerating AI adoption.

home.title: We bridge legacy organizations into the AI era
home.subtitle: Incubator, Academy, and Placement services united under one platform.
home.body: We partner with municipalities, colleges, and enterprises to deliver measurable AI adoption with accountable governance.

hero.alt: Animated hero visual showing layered AI systems

about.title: About ORTAM AI
about.body:
ORTAM AI helps public sector and education leaders unlock the promise of responsible AI.

We deliver an end-to-end playbook that combines incubation, enablement, and workforce development.

Our cross-functional team brings experience from smart cities, academia, and startups to de-risk innovation.

academy.title: Flagship Academy Programs
academy.subtitle: Role-tailored curricula designed to create AI-first teams in weeks.
academy.body: Each track blends expert faculty, real-world labs, and an evolving resource library to ensure lasting adoption.

programs.title: Prompt Engineering for Innovation Leads
programs.description: Hands-on labs for governing generative AI and designing enterprise prompts.

programs.title: Operational AI Agents
programs.description: Train technical squads to deploy automations, integrations, and SOPs.

programs.title: HR + AI for People Teams
programs.description: Toolkits for recruitment, learning, and engagement augmented by AI.

programs.title: AI Literacy for Educators
programs.description: Parent-teacher-student model for equitable AI adoption in schools.

incubator.title: Incubator Journey
incubator.subtitle: Accelerate AI initiatives from discovery to scale with co-creation and guided pilots.
incubator.body:
**Our path:**

1. Discovery & Alignment – assess needs, data readiness, and define measurable KPIs.
2. MVP / POC Build – deliver prototypes, integrate systems, and validate impact.
3. Guided Pilot – launch with real stakeholders, capture insights, and iterate.
4. Scale & Enablement – transition to full operations with governance and training.

hero.alt: Strategy session with ORTAM AI incubator

placement.title: Placement & Apprenticeship
placement.subtitle: A dual-track model connecting academy graduates with employers building AI capabilities.
placement.body:
**For employers**

- Pre-vetted talent aligned to your AI roadmap.
- Onboarding and mentorship delivered by ORTAM AI coaches.
- Performance dashboards and retention support.

**For candidates**

- Hands-on apprenticeships inside live AI programs.
- Personal mentorship and portfolio development.
- Placements with municipalities, colleges, and enterprise partners.

contact.title: Let's connect
contact.subtitle: Tell us about your priorities and we'll tailor the next step together.

contactForm.successMessage: Thanks for reaching out! We'll respond within one business day.
